<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.11.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="FurtherAssurances"><u>Further
Assurances</u></a>.&#160; Each party hereto
shall execute and deliver after the date hereof such further certificates,
agreements and other documents and take such other actions as another party
hereto may reasonably request to consummate or implement the transactions
contemplated hereby.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.12.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="GoverningLaw"><u>Governing Law</u></a>.&#160; This Agreement shall be governed by and
construed in accordance with the internal laws (as opposed to the conflicts of
law provisions) of the State of Delaware.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.13.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="SubmissionToJurisdiction"><u>Submission
to Jurisdiction</u></a>.&#160; Subject to <u>Section
10.14</u>, each of the parties hereto hereby irrevocably and unconditionally
submits in any suit, action or proceeding arising out of or related to this
Agreement or any of the transactions contemplated hereby to the jurisdiction of
the courts of the State of New York, the courts of the United States of America
for the Southern District of New York and any appellate courts from any thereof
and irrevocably waives any immunity from the jurisdiction of such courts and
any claim of improper venue, <u>forum</u>  <u>non</u>  <u>conveniens</u> or any
similar objection which it might otherwise be entitled to raise in any such
suit, action or proceeding.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.14.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="DisputeResolution"><u>Dispute
Resolution</u></a>.</font></h2>

<h3 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Representatives</u>.&#160; Except as otherwise provided herein, if any
dispute arises under or relates to this Agreement, at the written request of
either party, each party will appoint one or two designated representatives
(the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Representative</font></b>&#148;, which, in the case of
Sellers, shall be deemed to be each Unitholders Representatives) to meet for
the purpose of resolving the dispute.&#160;
The Representatives will meet at a mutually agreeable place within ten
(10) Business Days after either party makes a written request to the other for
such a meeting.&#160; The Representatives will
honor reasonable requests to exchange information related to the dispute and
will make an effort to negotiate a resolution to the dispute.&#160; Negotiations shall continue until the dispute
is resolved or until either party informs the other in writing that
negotiations will not result in a mutually acceptable resolution and an
arbitrator should be appointed.</font></h3>

<h3 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Arbitration</u>.</font></h3>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; In the event the dispute is not
resolved under <u>Section 10.14(a)</u>, the parties agree that the dispute
shall be resolved by a private arbitration conducted by one arbitrator.&#160; Within fifteen (15) Business Days after the
termination of negotiations pursuant to <u>Section 10.14(a)</u>, the parties
shall agree upon one (1) arbitrator (the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Arbitrator</font></b>&#148;),
selected from a permanent panel of no fewer than fifteen (15) names agreed upon
by the parties (the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Permanent Panel</font></b>&#148;).&#160; If the parties are unable to agree on the
fifteen (15) names for the Permanent Panel, either party may refer the matter
to the office of the American Arbitration Association (&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">AAA</font></b>&#148;)
for the limited purpose of having AAA provide such number of names as are not
agreed upon by the parties.&#160; The parties
shall select the arbitrator from the Permanent Panel by alternately striking
names until only one name remains on the Permanent Panel.&#160; A toss of a coin will determine which party
is to strike the first name.&#160; Neither
party may choose as its arbitrator the person who was its Representative under <u>Section
10.14(a)</u> or any person who is an officer, director or employee of either
party or any Affiliate of either party, or a person who has a direct or
indirect personal or financial interest in the outcome of the arbitration.</font></h4>

<h2 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">48</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='48',FILE='C:\JMS\sjayara\04-15138-1\task260922\15138-1-ka.htm',USER='sjayaraman',CD='Dec 23 01:24 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Arbitrator shall set a hearing
date for an arbitration (the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Hearing</font></b>&#148;)
within ninety (90) days from the date the Arbitrator is selected, unless
otherwise agreed by the parties, or unless otherwise ordered by the Arbitrator
at the request of either party.</font></h4>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Unless otherwise agreed, within
fifteen (15) days before the Hearing, each party shall submit to the Arbitrator
with a copy to the other party a list of all witnesses and exhibits which it
intends to present at the Hearing.&#160; At
the request of any party the Arbitrator, consistent with the expedited nature
of arbitration, shall have the authority to order such discovery, by way of
deposition, interrogatory, document production, or otherwise, as the Arbitrator
considers necessary to a full and fair exploration of the issues in dispute.</font></h4>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; No later than ten (10) days before the
scheduled Hearing, each party shall provide to the Arbitrator a short (not to
exceed five (5) single-spaced pages or such other page limit as the Arbitrator
permits) statement of its position with regard to the dispute.</font></h4>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; At the Hearing, each party shall, unless
it waives the opportunity, make an oral opening statement, and an oral closing
statement.</font></h4>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vi)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; When testimony is complete and each
party has introduced its exhibits, subject to the provisions of this Agreement,
and each party has made a closing statement pursuant to the provisions of this
Agreement or waived the opportunity to do so, the Arbitrator shall declare the
Hearing closed; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, the parties may submit
post-hearing briefs pursuant to an agreed upon schedule or one formulated by
the Arbitrator.</font></h4>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Hearing shall be held at a location
in City of New York agreed upon by the parties and convenient for the
Arbitrator, or if the parties cannot agree upon a location, at a location in
the City of New York designated by the Arbitrator.</font></h4>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(viii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Hearing shall be conducted in
private.&#160; Attendance at the Hearing shall
be limited to the following:&#160; (i) the
Arbitrator; (ii) Representatives or their designated replacements; (iii) each
affected party&#146;s attorneys (including in-house counsel) and attorneys&#146;
assistants or consultants, if any; (iv) a court reporter if requested by either party; and (v) any witnesses, including expert
witnesses.&#160; The Arbitrator may sequester
witnesses upon the motion of a party.</font></h4>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ix)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Within thirty (30) days of the close
of the Hearing or submission of the post-hearing briefs, the Arbitrator shall
issue a written opinion and award (the &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Award</font></b>&#148;) based
on evidence, arguments and post-hearing briefs, if any.&#160; The Award shall be a decision of the
Arbitrator, shall resolve the parties&#146; dispute, and shall be final and binding
on the parties.&#160; The fact that an opinion
is issued does not enlarge or restrict the authority of a court provided in the
AAA&#146;s Commercial Arbitration Rules to review the arbitration proceedings or the
Award.&#160; The Arbitrator shall have the
Award delivered to each party in accordance with <u>Section 10.2</u>.</font></h4>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(x)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Except as otherwise provided in this
Agreement, there shall be no ex parte communication regarding the subject
matter of the Hearing between a party or its attorneys and any Arbitrator from
the time the Arbitrator is appointed until after the parties receive the Award.</font></h4>

<h2 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">49</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='49',FILE='C:\JMS\sjayara\04-15138-1\task260922\15138-1-ka.htm',USER='sjayaraman',CD='Dec 23 01:24 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xi)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The parties may agree to submit the
dispute to the Arbitrator without a Hearing, based upon a joint written
statement agreed upon within 75 days after the Arbitrator is selected, in which
event the Arbitrator will render and deliver to the parties a written opinion
and Award within thirty (30) days of being notified that the parties waive the
Hearing.</font></h4>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Notwithstanding any other provision of
this Agreement, the Arbitrator shall have no power to delete
from, add to, nor modify the terms of this Agreement, and may not award any
remedy which effectively conflicts directly or indirectly with any provision of
this Agreement.</font></h4>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xiii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The arbitration shall be governed by
AAA&#146;s Commercial Rules of Arbitration, except as otherwise provided in this
Agreement.</font></h4>

<h4 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xiv)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All expenses, costs and attorneys fees
of the arbitration shall be paid by the nonprevailing party.&#160; The arbitrator shall award such expenses in
the arbitration award.&#160; All fees of the
Arbitrator shall be initially advanced equally, one-half by the Purchaser and
one-half by the Sellers.</font></h4>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; *&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; *</font></p>

<h2 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">50</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='50',FILE='C:\JMS\sjayara\04-15138-1\task260922\15138-1-ka.htm',USER='sjayaraman',CD='Dec 23 01:24 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS
WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Agreement to be executed the day
and year first above written.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ANNEX I</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">MEMBERSHIP INTEREST PURCHASE AGREEMENT</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Definitions</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">AAA</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 10.14(b)(i)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Affiliate</font></b>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, any other
Person that directly or indirectly controls, is controlled by or is under
common control with such Person.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Agreed Accounting Firm</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
2.4(d)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Agreed Adjustments</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
2.4(c)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Agreed Rate</font></b>&#148; means the prime or reference rate published by
Bank of America, National Association, as that rate may vary from time to time,
or if that rate is no longer published, a comparable rate.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Arbitrator</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 10.14(b)(i)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Audited Financial Statements</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.4</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Auditors</font></b>&#148; means McGladrey &amp; Pullen, LLP, independent
public accountants for Company.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Authorized Representatives</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
7.1</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Award</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 10.14(b)(ix)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Balance Sheet</font></b>&#148; means the audited balance sheet of Company as
of December 31, 2003 included in <u>Schedule 5.4</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Balance Sheet Date</font></b>&#148; means June 30, 2004.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Business Day</font></b>&#148; means any day that is not a Saturday, Sunday
or a day on which banks are required by law or banking regulation to be closed
in the State of New York.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Capitalized Lease Obligations</font></b>&#148; has the meaning given such
term in the Statement of Financial Accounting Standards No. 13.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Cashed Out Class E Unitholders</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in
the Recitals.&#148;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Cashed Out Units</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the Recitals.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">CERCLA</font></b>&#148; means the Comprehensive Environmental Response,
Compensation and Liability Act, 42 U.S.C. &#167;&#167; 9601 <u>et</u>  <u>seq</u>., any
amendments thereto, any successor statutes, and any regulations promulgated
thereunder.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Charter Document(s)</font></b>&#148; means a Certificate of Incorporation,
Certificate of Formation, or other constitutive document filed with the
requisite Governmental Body, as amended through the date hereof.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Claim Notice</font></b>&#148;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">  </font></b>has the
meaning specified in <u>Section 9.4(b)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Class A Return</font></b>&#148; shall have the meaning&#160; set forth in the Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Class A Unit</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the Recitals
hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Class B Preference Amount</font></b>&#148; shall have the meaning set forth
in the Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Class B Unit</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the Recitals
hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Class C Return</font></b>&#148;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">  </font></b>&#160;shall have the meaning set forth in the
Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Class C Unit</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the Recitals
hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Class D Return</font></b>&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in the
Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Class D Unit</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the Recitals
hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Class E Unitholders</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the
Recitals hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Class E Units</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the Recitals
hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Class F Units</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the Recitals
hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Class G Unitholders</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the
Recitals hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Class G Units</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the Recitals
hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Closing</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 3.2</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Closing Date</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 3.2</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Closing Date Balance Sheet</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
2.4(b)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Code</font></b>&#148; means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended
from time to time.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Company</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the preamble to this
Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Company Agreements</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.21</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Company Business</font></b>&#148; means the business currently conducted by
Company and its Subsidiaries.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Company Group</font></b>&#148; means any &#147;affiliated group&#148; (as defined in
Section 1504(a) of the Code without regard to the limitations contained in
Section 1504(b) of the Code) that, at any time on or before the Closing Date,
includes or has included Company, any Subsidiary, or any predecessor of or
successor to Company or any Subsidiary (or another such predecessor or
successor), or any other</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Page 2</font></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='Page 2',FILE='C:\JMS\sjayara\04-15138-1\task260922\15138-1-ka.htm',USER='sjayaraman',CD='Dec 23 01:24 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">group
of corporations which, at any time on or before the Closing Date, files or has
filed Tax Returns on a combined, consolidated or unitary basis with Company or
any predecessor of or successor to Company (or another such predecessor or
successor).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Company Property</font></b>&#148; means any real or personal property,
plant, building, facility, structure, underground storage tank, equipment or
unit, or other asset currently owned, leased or operated by Company or any of
its Subsidiaries (including any surface water thereon or adjacent thereto and
any soil or ground water thereunder).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Confidentiality Agreement</font></b>&#148; means that certain
Confidentiality Agreement dated April 27, 2004 between Purchaser and an
authorized representative of Company.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Consent</font></b>&#148; means the consent, approval or authorization
required under any Contract, Requirement of Law or Court Order.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Contaminant</font></b>&#148; means any waste, pollutant, hazardous or toxic
substance or waste, petroleum, petroleum-based substance or waste,
polychlorinated biphenyls, special waste, or any constituent of any such
substance or waste.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Contract</font></b>&#148; means any binding written or oral agreement,
contract, undertaking, instrument, lease, license or commitment of any kind or
nature.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Court Order</font></b>&#148; means any judgment, order, award or decree of
any foreign, federal, state, local or other court or tribunal and any award in
any arbitration proceeding.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#147;CPC/Company
Revolving Credit Agreement</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#148; means the Revolving Credit Agreement dated as of
March 15, 2002 by and between Company, as borrower, and CPC, as financier, as
the same may have been amended, restated, modified or replaced from time to
time.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Customers</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 5.9</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Debt</font></b>&#148; means (i) indebtedness for borrowed money of Company
and its Subsidiaries; (ii) any indebtedness of Company or any of its
Subsidiaries (excluding intercompany indebtedness) evidenced by any note, bond,
debenture or other debt security; (iii) Capitalized Lease Obligations for which
Company or any of its Subsidiaries is liable; (iv) all accrued and unpaid
interest on or any fees, penalties, including, without limitation, prepayment
fees or other amounts due with respect to any such indebtedness whether at
maturity or otherwise; and (v) without duplication, any obligations of any
other Person of a type referred to in <u>clauses (i) &#151; (iv)</u> to the extent
guaranteed by Company or any of its Subsidiaries.&#160; The determination of the amount of the Debt
at the relevant time of determination with shall be made on a consolidated
basis with respect to Company and its Subsidiaries, in accordance with GAAP,
consistently applied.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Deferred Payout Class E Unitholders</font></b>&#148; has the meaning set
forth in the Recitals.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Deferred Payout Class G Unitholders</font></b>&#148; has the meaning set
forth in the Recitals.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Deferred Payout Sellers</font></b>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the
Recitals.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Deferred Payout Units</font></b>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the
Recitals.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Earnout Consideration</font></b>&#148; has the meaning set forth in <u>Section
2.6.</u></font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">EBITDA</font></b>&#148; means the Company&#146;s earnings before interest, taxes,
depreciation and amortization, <u>plus</u> any extraordinary or non-recurring
non-cash losses (as identified as such in the Purchaser&#146;s MD&amp;A reflected in
any of the Forms 10-Q or 10-K filed with respect to any portion of the
Measurement Period), <u>less</u> any extraordinary or non-recurring non-cash
gains (as identified as such in the Purchaser&#146;s MD&amp;A reflected in any of
the forms 10-Q or 10-K filed with respect to any portion of the Measurement
Period).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Effective Time</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 3.1</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Employment Agreements</font></b>&#148; means the Employment Agreements to be
entered into at the Closing by and between the Company, on the one hand, and
Michael Levin, Joanne Levin and Charles Ginn, on the other hand, including, in
the case of Michael Levin and Joanne Levin, the Option Agreements contemplated
thereby.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Encumbrance</font></b>&#148; means any lien, claim, charge, security
interest, mortgage, pledge, easement, conditional sale or other title retention
agreement, defect in title, covenant or other restriction of any kind.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Environmental Encumbrance</font></b>&#148;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">  </font></b>means
an Encumbrance in favor of any Governmental Body for (i) any liability under
any Environmental Law, or (ii) damages arising from, or costs incurred by such
Governmental Body in response to, a Release or threatened Release of a
Contaminant into the environment.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Environmental Law</font></b>&#148; means all Requirements of Laws derived
from or relating to all federal, state and local laws or regulations relating
to or addressing the environment, worker or public health or safety, or the
use, treatment, storage disposal, Release or transportation of a Contaminant,
including but not limited to CERCLA, OSHA and RCRA and any state equivalent
thereof.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">ERISA</font></b>&#148; means the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of
1974, as amended from time to time, including any regulations promulgated
thereunder.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">ERISA Affiliate</font></b>&#148;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">  </font></b>has the
meaning specified in <u>Section 5.18(h)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">ERISA Benefit Plans</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.18(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Estimated Cash Purchase Price</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
2.3(d)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Estimated Cash Purchase Price Per Unit</font></b>&#148; has the meaning
specified in <u>Section 2.3(d)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Estimated Net Working Capital</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
2.3(d)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Excluded Taxes</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
8.4(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Expense</font></b>&#148; means any and all expenses reasonably incurred in
connection with investigating, defending or asserting any claim, action, suit
or proceeding incident to any matter indemnified against hereunder (including,
without limitation, court filing fees, court costs, arbitration fees or costs,
witness fees and reasonable fees and disbursements and other charges of legal
counsel, investigators, expert witnesses, consultants, accountants and other
professionals), incurred by a Requesting Party in connection with any claim,
suit, action or proceeding in respect of which the Requesting Party is seeking
indemnification.</font></p>

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">GAAP</font></b>&#148; means United States generally accepted accounting
principles, as in effect as of the relevant date.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">GAH</font></b>&#148; means Goldsmith, Agio, Helms &amp; Lynner, LLC.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">GECC</font></b>&#148; has the meaning set forth in <u>Section 3.2</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Governmental Body</font></b>&#148; means any foreign, domestic, federal,
territorial, state or local governmental authority, quasi-governmental
authority, instrumentality, court, legislative body, government or
self-regulatory organization, commission, court, tribunal or organization or
any regulatory, administrative or other agency, or any political or other
subdivision, department or branch of any of the foregoing.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Governmental Permits</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.8(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Hearing</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 10.14(b)(ii)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Indemnitor</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 9.4(b)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Intellectual Property</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.15(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">IRS</font></b>&#148; means the Internal Revenue Service.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Knowledge</font></b>&#148; means only the actual current conscious awareness
of the applicable Person.&#160; In the case of
&#147;Sellers&#146; Knowledge,&#148; means the actual current conscious awareness of Michael
Levin, Joanne Levin, Neville Levin and Charles Ginn.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Leased Real Property</font></b>&#148;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">  </font></b>has the
meaning specified in <u>Section 5.11</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Loss</font></b>&#148; means any and all losses, costs, obligations,
liabilities, settlement payments, awards, judgments, fines, penalties, damages,
expenses, deficiencies or other charges.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Material Adverse Effect</font></b>&#148; means any change or effect (or any
development that, insofar as can be reasonably foreseen, would result in any
change or effect) that (i) is materially adverse to the assets, business, financial
condition or results of operations of the applicable Person or Persons, on a
consolidated basis, or (ii) would materially and adversely impair the ability
of the applicable Person to consummate the Sale and the other transactions
contemplated hereby; <u>provided</u> however, that &#147;Material Adverse Effect&#148;
does not include material adverse changes or effects on the assets, business,
financial condition or results of operations of such Person caused by (x)
events, conditions or circumstances that generally affect the economy or the
industry in which Company operates or (y)&nbsp;consequences directly relating
to the announcement or pendency of the Sale.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Measurement Date</font></b>&#148; means the last day of the Measurement
Period.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Measurement Period</font></b>&#148; means the thirty-six (36) month period
commencing on December&nbsp;1, 2004.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Multiemployer Plans</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.18(c)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Net Reserve Proceeds</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
8.1(f)</u>.</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Net Working Capital</font></b>&#148; means, as of the applicable date of
determination, an amount equal to (a) the current assets, excluding cash, <u>less</u>
(b) current liabilities, determined in accordance with the GAAP, excluding
Debt, but including all accrued current obligations.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Non-ERISA Commitments</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.18(b)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Operating Agreement</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the
Recitals hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">OSHA</font></b>&#148; means the Occupational Safety and Health Act, 29
U.S.C. &#167;&#167; 651 <u>et</u>  <u>seq</u>., any amendment
thereto, any successor statute, and any regulations promulgated thereunder.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Owned Software</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.15(f)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Pension Plans</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.18(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Percentage Share</font></b>&#148; shall mean the percentage set forth
opposite each Cashed Out Unitholders&#146; name on <u>Schedule
3.2(b)</u> hereof.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Permanent Panel</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
10.15(b)(i)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Permitted Encumbrances</font></b>&#148; means (a) liens for taxes and other
governmental charges and assessments which are not yet due and payable, (b)
liens of landlords and liens of carriers, warehousemen, mechanics and
materialmen and other like liens arising in the ordinary course of business for
sums not yet due and payable and (c) other liens or imperfections on property
which are not material in amount, do not interfere with, and are not violated
by the consummation of the transactions contemplated by, this Agreement and do
not materially detract from the value or marketability of, or materially impair
the existing use of, the property affected by such lien or imperfection.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Person</font></b>&#148; means any individual, corporation, limited liability
company, partnership, joint venture, association, joint-stock company, trust,
unincorporated organization or Governmental Body.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Personal Property Leases</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.14</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Preliminary Accounting Report</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
2.3(a)(iii)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Preliminary Balance Sheet</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
2.4(a)(i)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Preliminary Purchase Price</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
2.4(a)(ii)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Preliminary Working Capital Statement</font></b>&#148; has the meaning
specified in <u>Section 2.4(a)(i)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Pre-Sale Directors</font></b>&#148; means those directors
serving on Company&#146;s board of directors immediately prior to the Closing Date.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Prior Multiemployer Plans</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.18(c)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Prior Pension Plans</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.18(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Page 6</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

</font></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Pro Rata Share</font></b>&#148; means a percentage obtained by dividing (i)
the number of Cashed Out Units owned by the applicable
Seller (with the Warrantholder treated as the owner of 2,220 Cashed Out Units)
by (ii) the total number of Cashed Out Units.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Purchase Price</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
2.3(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Purchaser</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the preamble to this
Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Purchaser Group Member</font></b>&#148; means (i) Purchaser and its
Affiliates, (ii) their respective successors and assigns, and (iii) the
officers, directors, partners, managers, shareholders and members (other than
Sellers), employees (other than Sellers) and agents of any of the foregoing.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Purchaser Indemnification Threshold</font></b>&#148; has the meaning
specified in <u>Section 9.2(b)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">RCRA</font></b>&#148; means the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act, 42
U.S.C. &#167;&#167; 6901 <u>et</u>  <u>seq</u>., and any successor statute, and any
regulations promulgated thereunder.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Related Documents</font></b>&#148; means this Agreement, the Employment
Agreements and each other agreement, instrument or document executed and
delivered by one or more of the parties hereto pursuant to, or in connection
with, this Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Release</font></b>&#148; means any release, spill, emission, leaking,
pumping, injection, deposit, disposal, discharge, dispersal, leaching or
migration of a Contaminant into the indoor or outdoor environment or into or
out of any Company Property, including the movement of Contaminants through or
in the air, soil, surface water, groundwater or any Company Property.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Remedial Action</font></b>&#148; means actions required to (i) clean up,
remove, treat or in any other way address Contaminants in the indoor or outdoor
environment; (ii) prevent the Release or threatened Release or minimize the
further Release of Contaminants or (iii) investigate and determine if a
remedial response is needed and to design such a response and post-remedial
investigation, monitoring, operation and maintenance and care.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Representative</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
10.14(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Requesting Party</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
9.4(b)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Requirements of Laws</font></b>&#148; means any foreign, federal, state and
local laws, statutes, regulations, rules, codes or ordinances, executive
orders, judgments, decrees and court orders enacted, adopted, issued or
promulgated by any Governmental Body (including, without limitation, those
pertaining to electrical, building, zoning, environmental and occupational
safety and health requirements) or common law.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Reserve</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 8.1(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Reserve Amount</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
8.1(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Restructuring</font></b>&#148; means the transactions effected pursuant to
the Master Agreement dated March 15, 2002 by and among Company, CPC, California
KL Holdings, Inc. and the other signatories thereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Review Period</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
2.4(b)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Sale</font></b>&#148; means the purchase and sale of the Units at the Closing.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">SEC</font></b>&#148; means the United States Securities and Exchange
Commission (or its successor).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Seller Group Member</font></b>&#148; means (i) each Seller and each
Affiliate of such Person, (ii) their respective successors and assigns, and
(iii) the officers, directors, partners, managers, shareholders, employees of
any of the foregoing, and, to the extent not otherwise covered, each
Unitholders Representative.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Sellers</font></b>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in the first
paragraph of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Senior Indebtedness</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
2.6(c)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Senior Indebtedness Agent</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
2.6(c)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Software</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 5.15(b)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Special Claim</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
9.2(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Statements of Income</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.4</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Straddle Period</font></b>&#148; means any taxable year or period beginning
on or before, and ending after, the Closing Date.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Subsidiary</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 5.2</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Target Net Working Capital</font></b>&#148; means $14,708,841.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Tax</font></b>&#148;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">  </font></b>(and with
correlative meaning, &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Taxes</font></b>&#148; and &#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">taxable</font></b>&#148;) means:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; any federal, state, local or foreign
net income, net receipts, alternative or add-on minimum, gross income, gross
receipts, property, ad valorem, sales, use, value added, transfer, gains,
license, franchise, severance,&#160; excise,
employment, payroll, environmental, windfall profit, withholding, alternative
or add on minimum tax, stamp or any other tax, custom, duty, governmental fee
or other like assessment or charge of any kind whatsoever, together with any
interest or any penalty, addition to tax or additional amount imposed by any
Governmental Body; and</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; any liability of Company or any
Subsidiary for the payment of amounts with respect to payments of a type
described in clause (i) of this definition as a result of being a member of an
affiliated, consolidated, combined or unitary group, or as a result of any
obligation of Company or any Subsidiary under any Tax Sharing Arrangement or
Tax indemnity arrangement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Tax Loss</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 8.4(e)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Tax Return</font></b>&#148; means any return, report or similar statement
required to be filed with respect to any Taxes (including any attached
schedules), including, without limitation, any information return, claim for
refund, amended return or declaration of estimated Tax.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Tax Sharing Arrangement</font></b>&#148; means any written or unwritten
agreement or arrangement for the allocation or payment of Tax liabilities or
payment for Tax benefits with respect to a consolidated, combined or unitary
Tax Return, which Tax Return includes Company or any Subsidiary.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Tentative Working Capital Adjustment</font></b>&#148; has the meaning
specified in <u>Section 2.4(a)(ii)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Transaction Costs</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
2.3(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Units</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the Recitals.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Unitholders Representatives</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
8.1(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Unitholders Representative Expenses</font></b>&#148; has the meaning
specified in <u>Section 8.1(d)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Unaudited Financial Statements</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in
<u>Section 5.4</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Unit</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the Recitals hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Unit Seller&#148;</font></b> means each Seller of a Unit.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">US</font></b>&#148; means United States of America.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">WARN</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section 5.19(c)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Warrantholder</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in the first
paragraph of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Welfare Plans</font></b>&#148; has the meaning specified in <u>Section
5.18(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Working Capital Adjustment</font></b>&#148; means the adjustment, upward or
downward, on a dollar for dollar basis of (a) Net Working Capital, as compared
to (b) the Target Net Working Capital (it being agreed by the parties hereto
that such adjustment shall be made only if the amount by which either (A) Net
Working Capital exceeds Target Net Working Capital or (B) Target Net Working
Capital exceeds Net Working Capital, is greater than US$500,000 (at which time,
the Working Capital Adjustment shall be in an amount equal to the full amount
of such excess)).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
