  <p align="left" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#IndemnificationOfPurchaserGroupMembe" title="Click to goto Indemnification of Purchaser Group Members">9.2.
  Indemnification of Purchaser Group Members</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#IndemnificationOfSellerGroupMembers" title="Click to goto Indemnification of Seller Group Members">9.3. Indemnification
  of Seller Group Member</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#NoticeAndDeterminationOfClaims" title="Click to goto Notice and Determination of Claims">9.4. Notice and
  Determination of Claims</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#ThirdPersonClaims" title="Click to goto Third Person Claims">9.5. Third Person Claims</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#PaymentOfPurchaserGroupMemberIndemn" title="Click to goto Payment of Purchaser Group Member Indemnification">9.6.
  Payment of Purchaser Group Member Indemnification</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#ExclusiveRemedy" title="Click to goto Exclusive Remedy">9.7. Exclusive Remedy</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#ArticleXGeneralProvisions" title="Click to goto ARTICLE X GENERAL PROVISIONS">ARTICLE X GENERAL
  PROVISIONS</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#ConfidentialNatureOfInformation" title="Click to goto Confidential Nature of Information">10.1. Confidential
  Nature of Information</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#Notices" title="Click to goto Notices">10.2. Notices</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#SuccessorsAndAssigns" title="Click to goto Successors and Assigns">10.3. Successors and Assigns</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#AccessToRecordsAfterClosingDate" title="Click to goto Access to Records After Closing Date">10.4. Access to
  Records After Closing Date</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#EntireAgreementAmendments" title="Click to goto Entire Agreement; Amendments">10.5. Entire Agreement;
  Amendments</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#Interpretation" title="Click to goto Interpretation">10.6. Interpretation</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">

  </td>
 </tr>

  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">

  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">

  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">

  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">

 </tr>

  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:86.76%;">

  Counterparts</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:13.24%;">

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-4.2
<SEQUENCE>3
<FILENAME>a04-15138_1ex4d2.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-4.2
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>





</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit
4.2</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">FINANCING
AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Financing Agreement, dated as of December&nbsp;15, 2004, by and among RUSS
BERRIE AND COMPANY, INC., a New Jersey corporation (the&nbsp;&#148;<u>Borrower</u>&#148;),
each subsidiary of the Borrower listed as a &#147;Guarantor&#148; on the signature pages
hereto (each a &#147;<u>Guarantor</u>&#148; and collectively, jointly and severally, the &#147;<u>Guarantors</u>&#148;),
the lenders from time to time party hereto (each a &#147;<u>Lender</u>&#148; and
collectively, the&nbsp;&#148;<u>Lenders</u>&#148;), ABLECO FINANCE LLC, a Delaware
limited liability company (&#147;<u>Ableco</u>&#148;), as collateral agent for the
Lenders (in such capacity, together with any successor collateral agent,
the&nbsp;&#148;<u>Collateral Agent</u>&#148;), and Ableco, as administrative agent for
the Lenders (in such capacity, together with any successor administrative
agent, the&nbsp;&#148;<u>Administrative Agent</u>&#148; and together with the Collateral
Agent, each an &#147;<u>Agent</u>&#148; and collectively, the &#147;<u>Agents</u>&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">RECITALS</font></b></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Borrower has asked the Lenders to extend credit to the Borrower
consisting of a term loan in the aggregate principal amount of
$125,000,000.&#160; The proceeds of the term
loan shall be used to finance, in part, the acquisition of all of the
outstanding membership interests, and all of the outstanding warrants to
purchase membership interests, of Kids Line, LLC, a Delaware limited liability
company (&#147;<u>Kids Line</u>&#148;), and to pay fees and expenses related to such
acquisition and this Agreement.&#160; The
Lenders are severally, and not jointly, willing to extend such credit to the
Borrower subject to the terms and conditions hereinafter set forth.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In consideration of the premises and the covenants and agreements
contained herein, the parties hereto agree as follows:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><a name="ArticleiDefinitionsCertainTerms"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE&nbsp;I<br>
<br>
DEFINITIONS; CERTAIN TERMS</font></b></a></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:84.25pt;"><a name="Section1_01"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1.01</font></a><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Definitions</u>.&#160; As used in this Agreement, the following
terms shall have the respective meanings indicated below, such meanings to be
applicable equally to both the singular and plural forms of such terms:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:84.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Ableco</u>&#148;
has the meaning specified therefore in the preamble hereto.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Account
Debtor</u>&#148; means any Person who is or who may become obligated under, with
respect to, or on account of, an Account Receivable, chattel paper, or a
general intangible.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Account Receivable</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, all of
such Person&#146;s now owned or hereafter acquired right, title, and interest with
respect to &#147;accounts&#148; (as that term is defined in the Code), any and all &#147;supporting
obligations&#148; (as that term is defined in the Code) in respect thereof, and any
and all other accounts receivable, collections and payments receivable
(including insurance proceeds, proceeds of cash sales, rental proceeds and tax
refunds).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\eschaeffer\04-15138-1\task259739\15138-1-kc-01.htm',USER='eschaef',CD='Dec 21 15:43 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Acquisition</u>&#148; means the purchase of all of the outstanding
membership interests of Kids Line, and all outstanding warrants for the
purchase of membership interests of Kids Line, from the Selling Parties, all as
contemplated by and transacted in accordance with the terms and conditions of
the Acquisition Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Acquisition Agreement</u>&#148; means that certain Membership Interest
Purchase Agreement dated as of December&nbsp;15,&nbsp;2004, by and among the
Borrower, Kids Line and the Selling Parties.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Acquisition Closing Letter</u>&#148; means a letter, in form and
substance reasonably satisfactory to Agents, from all parties to the
Acquisition Agreement (a) setting forth the full amount of the purchase price
to be paid for the consummation of the Acquisition on the &#147;Closing Date&#148; (as
such term is defined in the Acquisition Agreement), and (b) representing that,
upon receipt by the Selling Parties of such purchase price amount, all
conditions to such consummation of the Acquisition shall have been satisfied
and the Borrower shall have completed its purchase of the &#147;Units&#148; and the &#147;Warrants&#148;
as such terms are defined in the Acquisition Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Acquisition Documents</u>&#148; means, collectively, the Acquisition
Agreement, the and all other instruments and agreements executed in connection
therewith, each in form and substance reasonably satisfactory to the Agents and
the Lenders.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Action</u>&#148; has the meaning specified therefor in <u>Section&nbsp;12.12</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Administrative Agent</u>&#148; has the meaning specified therefor in the
preamble hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Administrative Agent&#146;s Account</u>&#148; means an account at a bank
designated by the Administrative Agent from time to time as the account into
which the Borrower shall make all payments to the Administrative Agent for the
benefit of the Agents and the Lenders under this Agreement and the other Loan
Documents.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Affiliate</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, any other Person
that directly or indirectly through one or more intermediaries, controls, is
controlled by, or is under common control with, such Person.&#160; For purposes of this definition, &#147;control&#148; of
a Person means the power, directly or indirectly, either to (i) vote 10% or
more of the Capital Stock having ordinary voting power for the election of
directors of such Person or (ii) direct or cause the direction of the
management and policies of such Person whether by contract or otherwise.&#160; Notwithstanding anything herein to the
contrary, in no event shall any Agent or any Lender be considered an &#147;Affiliate&#148;
of any Loan Party.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>After Acquired Property</u>&#148; means any interest in real property
acquired by the Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries after the date hereof with
a Current Value in excess of $750,000 in the case of a fee interest or
requiring the payment of annual rent exceeding in the aggregate $250,000 in the
case of a leasehold interest.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Agent</u>&#148; and &#147;<u>Agents</u>&#148; have the meanings specified therefor
in the preamble hereto.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Agreement</u>&#148; means this Financing Agreement, including all
amendments, modifications and supplements thereto and any exhibits or schedules
to any of the foregoing, and shall refer to the Agreement as the same may be in
effect at the time such reference becomes operative.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Applicable Excess Cash Flow Prepayment Percentage</u>&#148; means, for
any Fiscal Year of the Borrower and its Subsidiaries, (i)&#160; if the Funded Debt Ratio as of the last day
of such Fiscal Year equals or exceeds 3.00 to 1.00, 75%, and (ii) if the Funded
Debt Ratio as of the last day of such Fiscal Year is less than 3.00 to 1.00,
50%; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that if the Borrower fails to provide the
certificate of Authorized Officer of the Borrower as required by <u>Section&nbsp;7.01(a)(iv)</u>
containing the Funded Debt Ratio for such Fiscal Year on or before the date
when due thereunder, the Applicable Excess Cash Flow Prepayment Percentage
shall mean 75%.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Assignment and Acceptance</u>&#148; means an assignment and acceptance
entered into by an assigning Lender and an assignee, and accepted by the
Collateral Agent, in accordance with <u>Section&nbsp;12.07</u> hereof and
substantially in the form of <u>Exhibit&nbsp;A-1 </u>hereto or such other form
acceptable to the Collateral Agent.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Authorized Officer</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, the
chief executive officer, chief financial officer, president or executive vice
president of such Person.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Backup Letter of Credit</u>&#148; has the meaning specified therefor in <u>Section&nbsp;2.09(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Backup Letter of Credit Issuer</u>&#148; means the bank which is from
time to time the issuer of the Backup Letter of Credit.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Backup Letter of Credit Lien</u>&#148; means the security interest
granted in favor of the Backup Letter of Credit Issuer on a deposit account of
the Borrower maintained with the Backup Letter of Credit Issuer, solely to
secure the Borrower&#146;s obligations with respect to the Backup Letter of Credit.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Backup Letter of Credit Reimbursement Agreement</u>&#148; means that
certain letter agreement dated the Effective Date between the Borrower and
Wells Fargo Foothill, Inc., as to issuance of, and the reimbursement of
drawings under, the Backup Letter of Credit.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Backup Letter of Credit Required Amount</u>&#148; means, (i) prior to
the Backup Letter of Credit Requirement Termination Date, $10,000,000, less the
aggregate amount indefeasibly paid to the Collateral Agent upon drawing on the
Backup Letter of Credit, and (ii) on and after the Backup Letter of Credit
Requirement Termination Date, $0.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Backup Letter of Credit Requirement Termination Date</u>&#148; means the
first Business Day immediately following the date a certificate of an
Authorized Officer of the Borrower is delivered to the Agents as required by <u>Section&nbsp;7.01(a)(iv)</u>
relating to the end of a fiscal quarter of the Borrower and its Subsidiaries,
certifying that the Funded Debt Ratio as of the last day of such fiscal quarter
is less than 3.00:1.00.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Bankruptcy Code</u>&#148; means the United States Bankruptcy Code (11
U.S.C. &#167;&nbsp;101, <u>et</u>  <u>seq</u>.), as amended, and any successor
statute.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

</font></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Base LIBOR Rate</u>&#148; means the rate per annum, determined by
Administrative Agent in accordance with its customary procedures, and utilizing
such electronic or other quotation sources as it considers appropriate (rounded
upwards, if necessary, to the next 1/16%), on the basis of the rates at which
Dollar deposits are offered to major banks in the London interbank market on or
about 11:00 a.m. (New York time) 2 Business Days prior to the commencement of
the applicable Interest Period, for a term and in amounts comparable to the
Interest Period and amount of the LIBOR Rate Loan requested by the Borrower in
accordance with this Agreement, which determination shall be conclusive in the
absence of manifest error.&#160;
Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Base LIBOR Rate shall be subject to a
minimum rate of one and three-quarters percentage points per annum (1.75%
p.a.), and, accordingly, to the extent that the Base LIBOR Rate on any day
would be less than the foregoing minimum rate, the Base LIBOR Rate hereunder
for such day automatically shall be deemed increased to such minimum rate.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>BNY</u>&#148; means The Bank of New York.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Board</u>&#148; means the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve
System of the United States.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Board of Directors</u>&#148; means the board of directors of Borrower or
any committee thereof duly authorized to act on behalf of the board of
directors.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Borrower</u>&#148; has the meaning specified therefor in the preamble
hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Borrower Financial Statements</u>&#148; means (i) the audited
consolidated balance sheet of the Borrower and its Subsidiaries for the Fiscal
Year ended December&nbsp;31, 2003, and the related consolidated statement of
operations, shareholders&#146; equity and cash flows for the Fiscal Year then ended,
and (ii)&nbsp;the unaudited consolidated balance sheet of the Borrower<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b>and its Subsidiaries for the ten months ended October&nbsp;31,
2004, and the related consolidated statement of operations, shareholder&#146;s
equity and cash flows for the ten months then ended.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#147;<u>Business Day</u>&#148; means any
day other than a Saturday, Sunday or other day on which commercial banks in New
York City are authorized or required to close, except that, if a determination
of a Business Day shall relate to a LIBOR Rate Loan, the term &#147;<u>Business Day</u>&#148;
also shall exclude any day on which banks generally are closed for dealings in
Dollar deposits in the London interbank market.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Capital Expenditures</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Person for any
period, the sum of&nbsp;the aggregate of all expenditures by such Person and
its Subsidiaries during such period that in accordance with GAAP are or should
be included in &#147;property, plant and equipment&#148; or in a similar fixed asset
account on its balance sheet, whether such expenditures are paid in cash or
financed and including all Capitalized Lease Obligations incurred during such
period.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Capital Guideline</u>&#148; means any law, rule, regulation, policy,
guideline or directive (whether or not having the force of law and whether or
not the failure to comply therewith would be unlawful) (i) regarding capital
adequacy, capital ratios, capital requirements, the calculation of a bank&#146;s
capital or similar matters, or (ii) affecting the amount of capital required to
be obtained or maintained by any Lender, any Person controlling any Lender, or
the manner in</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\JMS\eschaeffer\04-15138-1\task259739\15138-1-kc-01.htm',USER='eschaef',CD='Dec 21 15:43 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">which any Lender, any Person controlling any
Lender, allocates capital to any of its contingent liabilities, advances,
acceptances, commitments, assets or liabilities.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Capitalized Lease</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, any lease
of real or personal property by such Person as lessee which is required in
accordance with GAAP to be capitalized on the balance sheet of such Person.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Capitalized Lease Obligations</u>&#148; means, with respect to any
Person, obligations of such Person and its Subsidiaries under Capitalized
Leases, and, for purposes hereof, the amount of any such obligation shall be
the capitalized amount thereof determined in accordance with GAAP.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>CapitalSource</u>&#148; means CapitalSource Finance LLC, a Maryland
limited liability company.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Capital Stock</u>&#148; means (i) with respect to any Person that is a
corporation, any and all shares, interests, participations or other equivalents
(however designated and whether or not voting) of corporate stock, and (ii)
with respect to any Person that is not a corporation, any and all partnership,
membership or other equity interests of such Person.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Cash and Cash Equivalents</u>&#148; means all cash, deposit or
securities account balances, certificates of deposit or other financial
instruments properly classified as cash or cash equivalents under GAAP.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>CFC</u>&#148; means a controlled foreign corporation (as that term is
defined in the IRC).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Change of
Control</u>&#148; means each occurrence of any of the following:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the
shares of common stock of the Borrower ceases to be listed for trading on a
national securities exchange,</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any
&#147;person&#148; or &#147;group&#148; (within the meaning of Sections 13(d) and 14(d) of the
Exchange Act), other than Permitted Holders, becomes the beneficial owner (as
defined in Rule 13d-3 of the Exchange Act), directly or indirectly, of 40% or
more of the Capital Stock of Borrower having the right to vote for the election
of members of the Board of Directors,</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a
majority of the members of the Board of Directors do not constitute Continuing
Directors,</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the
Borrower ceases to own and control 100% of the shares of the Capital Stock of
each of the Borrower&#146;s Subsidiaries, unless otherwise permitted hereunder, or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>(i)
the Borrower<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b>consolidates with or merges into
another entity or conveys, transfers or leases all or substantially all of its
property and assets to any Person, or (ii) any entity consolidates with or
merges into the Borrower, which in either event set forth in clause (i) or (ii)
is pursuant to a transaction in which the outstanding voting Capital Stock of
the Borrower<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b>is reclassified or changed into
or exchanged for cash, securities or other property, other than any such
transaction in which the Permitted Holder shall have a beneficial ownership in
the</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\JMS\eschaeffer\04-15138-1\task259739\15138-1-kc-01.htm',USER='eschaef',CD='Dec 21 15:43 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">aggregate of at least 50.1% of the aggregate voting
power of all Capital Stock of the resulting, surviving or transferee entity.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Closing Fee</u>&#148; has the meaning specified therefor in <u>Section&nbsp;2.06(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Code</u>&#148; means the New York Uniform Commercial Code, as in effect
from time to time; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that in the event that, by
reason of mandatory provisions of law, any or all of the attachment,
perfection, priority, or remedies with respect to Collateral Agent&#146;s Liens on
any Collateral is governed by the Uniform Commercial Code as enacted and in
effect in a jurisdiction other than the State of New York, the term &#147;Code&#148;
shall mean the Uniform Commercial Code as enacted and in effect in such other
jurisdiction solely for purposes of the provisions thereof relating to such
attachment, perfection, priority, or remedies.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Collateral</u>&#148; means all of the property and assets and all
interests therein and proceeds thereof now owned or hereafter acquired by any
Person upon which a Lien is granted or purported to be granted by such Person
as security for all or any part of the Obligations.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Collateral Agent</u>&#148; has the meaning specified therefor in the
preamble hereto.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Collateral Agent Advances</u>&#148; has the meaning specified therefor
in <u>Section&nbsp;10.08(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Collection Account</u>&#148; and &#147;<u>Collection Accounts</u>&#148; have the
meanings specified therefor in <u>Section&nbsp;8.01(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#147;<u>Commitment</u>&#148; means, with
respect to each Lender, the commitment of such Lender to make its portion of
the Term Loan to the Borrower in the amount set forth in <u>Schedule&nbsp;T-1</u>
hereto, as the same may be terminated or reduced from time to time in
accordance with the terms of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Consolidated EBITDA</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Person for any
period, the Consolidated Net Income of such Person and its Subsidiaries for
such period, <u>minus</u> the aggregate amount of cash and non-cash non-recurring
income and gains of such Person and its Subsidiaries for such period to the
extent included in determining Consolidated Net Income of such Person and its
Subsidiaries for such period, <u>plus</u> (i) without duplication, the sum
of&nbsp;the following amounts of such Person and its Subsidiaries for such
period and to the extent deducted in determining Consolidated Net Income of
such Person and its Subsidiaries for such period:&#160; (A) Consolidated Net Interest Expense, (B)
income tax expense, (C) depreciation expense, (D)&nbsp;amortization expense,
(E) cash and non-cash non-recurring expenses and charges, and (F) all fees,
expenses or charges incident to the Acquisition (but exclusive of all fees,
expenses or charges arising from any Indebtedness of such Person or its
Subsidiaries to the extent included in clause (A) of this definition) in an
aggregate amount not to exceed $3,000,000.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Consolidated Funded Indebtedness</u>&#148; means, with respect to any
Person at any date, all Indebtedness of such Person, determined on a consolidated
basis in accordance with GAAP, which by its terms matures more than one year
after the date of calculation, and any such Indebtedness maturing within one
year from such date which is renewable or extendable at the option of such
Person to a date more than one year from such date, including, in any event,
but</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='6',FILE='C:\JMS\eschaeffer\04-15138-1\task259739\15138-1-kc-01.htm',USER='eschaef',CD='Dec 21 15:43 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">without duplication, with respect to the
Borrower and its Subsidiaries, the amount of their Capital Lease Obligations,
but excluding, with respect to the Borrower and its Subsidiaries, (i)
Indebtedness to the extent permitted by clauses (g) and (h) of the definition
of &#147;Permitted Indebtedness&#148;, (ii) Indebtedness of Borrower and the other Loan
Parties for Earnout Consideration, and (iii) Indebtedness of Borrower and its
Subsidiaries constituting Indebtedness of a type described in clauses (viii),
(ix), (x) or (xi) of the definition of Indebtedness.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Consolidated Net Income</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Person for
any period, the net income (loss) of such Person and its Subsidiaries for such
period, determined on a consolidated basis and in accordance with GAAP, but
excluding from the determination of Consolidated Net Income (without
duplication) (a)&nbsp;any non-cash extraordinary or non-recurring gains or
losses or non-cash gains or losses from Dispositions, (b) restructuring
charges, (c)&nbsp;effects of discontinued operations, (d) non-cash interest,
and (e) any tax refunds, net operating losses or other net tax benefits.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Consolidated Net Interest Expense</u>&#148; means, with respect to any
Person for any period, gross interest expense of such Person and its
Subsidiaries for such period determined on a consolidated basis and in
accordance with GAAP (including, without limitation, interest expense paid to
Affiliates of such Person and the amortization of fees payable in connection
with financing incurred to consummate the Acquisition (including, without
limitation, any fees or expenses payable to the Agents or Lenders hereunder or
pursuant to the commitment letter related hereto) or Indebtedness constituting
Permitted Indebtedness hereunder), <u>less</u> (i)&nbsp;the sum of
(A)&nbsp;interest income for such period and (B)&nbsp;gains for such period on
Hedging Agreements (to the extent not included in interest income above and to
the extent not deducted in the calculation of gross interest expense), <u>plus</u>
(ii)&nbsp;the sum of (A)&nbsp;losses for such period on Hedging Agreements (to
the extent not included in such gross interest expense) and (B)&nbsp;the
upfront costs or fees for such period associated with Hedging Agreements (to
the extent not included in such gross interest expense), in each case,
determined on a consolidated basis and in accordance with GAAP.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Contingent Obligation</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, any
obligation of such Person guaranteeing or intended to guarantee any
Indebtedness, leases, dividends or other obligations (&#147;primary obligations&#148;) of
any other Person (the&nbsp;&#148;primary obligor&#148;) in any manner, whether directly
or indirectly, including, without limitation, (i) the direct or indirect
guaranty, endorsement (other than for collection or deposit in the ordinary
course of business), co-making, discounting with recourse or sale with recourse
by such Person of the obligation of a primary obligor, (ii)&nbsp;the obligation
to make take-or-pay or similar payments, if required, regardless of
nonperformance by any other party or parties to an agreement, (iii) any
obligation of such Person, whether or not contingent, (A) to purchase any such
primary obligation or any property constituting direct or indirect security
therefor, (B) to advance or supply funds (1)&nbsp;for the purchase or payment
of any such primary obligation or (2)&nbsp;to maintain working capital or
equity capital of the primary obligor or otherwise to maintain the net worth or
solvency of the primary obligor, (C)&nbsp;to purchase property, assets,
securities or services primarily for the purpose of assuring the owner of any
such primary obligation of the ability of the primary obligor to make payment
of such primary obligation or (D)&nbsp;otherwise to assure or hold harmless the
holder of such primary obligation against loss in respect thereof; <u>provided</u>,
<u>however</u>, that the term &#147;Contingent Obligation&#148; shall not include any
product warranties extended in the ordinary course</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='7',FILE='C:\JMS\eschaeffer\04-15138-1\task259739\15138-1-kc-01.htm',USER='eschaef',CD='Dec 21 15:43 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">of business.&#160;
The amount of any Contingent Obligation shall (subject to any limitation
set forth therein) be deemed to be an amount equal to the stated or
determinable amount of the primary obligation with respect to which such
Contingent Obligation is made (or, if less, the maximum amount of such primary
obligation for which such Person may be liable pursuant to the terms of the
instrument evidencing such Contingent Obligation) or, if not stated or
determinable, the maximum reasonably anticipated liability with respect thereto
(assuming such Person is required to perform thereunder), as determined by such
Person in good faith.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Continuing Director</u>&#148; means (a) any member of the Board of
Directors who was a director (or comparable manager) of Borrower on the
Effective Date, and (b) any individual who becomes a member of the Board of
Directors after the Effective Date if such individual was appointed or
nominated for election to the Board of Directors by a majority of the
Continuing Directors.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Control Agreement</u>&#148; means a control agreement, in form and
substance satisfactory to the Collateral Agent, executed and delivered by the
Borrower or one of its Subsidiaries, Collateral Agent and the applicable
securities intermediary (as that term is defined in the Code), with respect to
a securities account (as that term is defined in the Code) maintained by such
securities intermediary located in the United States, or a bank (as that term
is defined in the Code), with respect to a deposit account (as that term is
defined in the Code) maintained by a branch of such bank located in the United
States, the execution of which control agreement results in the perfection of
the Collateral Agent&#146;s Lien on such deposit account or securities account, as
the case may be, to secure the Obligations.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>CPC/KL Holdings</u>&#148; means CPC/KL Holdings, LLC, a Delaware limited
liability company.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Current Value</u>&#148; has the meaning specified therefor in <u>Section&nbsp;7.01(o)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>December&nbsp;2004 Dividend</u>&#148; means that certain cash dividend
of $0.30 per common share of the Borrower&#146;s common stock, declared by the Board
of Directors of Borrower on November&nbsp;3, 2004 and paid on December&nbsp;3,
2004 to shareholders of record as of November&nbsp;19, 2004, in an aggregate
amount not to exceed $6,250,000.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Default</u>&#148; means an event which, with the giving of notice or the
lapse of time or both, would constitute an Event of Default.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Disposition</u>&#148; means any transaction, or series of related
transactions, pursuant to which any Person or any of its Subsidiaries sells,
assigns, transfers or otherwise disposes of any property or assets (whether now
owned or hereafter acquired) to any other Person, in each case, whether or not
the consideration therefor consists of cash, securities or other assets owned
by the acquiring Person.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Dollar</u>,&#148; &#147;<u>Dollars</u>&#148; and the symbol &#147;<u>$</u>&#148; each means
lawful money of the United States of America.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Domestic Subsidiary</u>&#148; means any Subsidiary of the Borrower that
is not a CFC.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\JMS\eschaeffer\04-15138-1\task259739\15138-1-kc-01.htm',USER='eschaef',CD='Dec 21 15:43 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Domestic Unrestricted Cash</u>&#148; means, as of any date of
determination, the amount of Unrestricted Cash of the Borrower and its Domestic
Subsidiaries that is subject to a Control Agreement and that is either on
deposit in a deposit account (as that term is defined in the Code) with a
branch office of a bank located in the United States, or in a securities
account (as such term is defined in the Code) with a securities intermediary
located within the United States, or any combination thereof.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Dollar Equivalent Amount</u>&#148; means, as of any date of
determination with respect to any amount of money denominated in a currency
other than Dollars, the amount of such money converted into Dollars at the
foreign currency exchange rate for such currency into Dollars as reasonably
determined by Administrative Agent to be in effect on such date.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Earnout Consideration</u>&#148; means the &#147;Earnout Consideration&#148; as
defined in the Acquisition Agreement as in effect on the date hereof (without
giving effect to any amendment or other modification thereof after the
Effective Date, except to the extent expressly consented to by the Required
Lenders).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Earnout Sellers</u>&#148; means, collectively, the &#147;Deferred Payout
Sellers&#148; as defined in the Acquisition Agreement as in effect on the date
hereof (without giving effect to any amendment or other modification thereof
after the Effective Date, except to the extent expressly consented to by the
Required Lenders or those permitted by Section&nbsp;7.02(r)).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Earnout Sellers Agent</u>&#148; means California KL Holdings, Inc., a
California corporation, as agent for the Earnout Sellers.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Earnout Sellers Lien</u>&#148; means the Lien in favor of the Earnout
Sellers under the Earnout Security Documents, which Lien shall at all times be
junior in priority to the Liens in favor of the Collateral Agent securing the
Obligations.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Earnout Security Documents</u>&#148; means, collectively, the Guaranty
and the Subordinated Security Agreement, each dated as of the Effective Date,
executed by the Loan Parties in favor of Earnout Sellers Agent for the benefit
of the Earnout Sellers as security for the Loan Parties&#146; obligations with
respect to payment of the Earnout Consideration, and any other agreement,
instrument, and other document executed and delivered pursuant thereto or
related to such security interests, in each case as in effect on the date
hereof (without giving effect to any amendment or other modification thereof
after the Effective Date).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA</u>&#148; means the New Jersey Economic Development Authority, a
public body corporate and politic constituting an instrumentality of the State
of New Jersey.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA Bondholders</u>&#148; means, collectively, the holders of EDA Bonds.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA Bonds</u>&#148; means, collectively, Variable/Fixed Rate Economic
Development Bonds (Russell Berrie &#150; 1983 Project) issued pursuant to the EDA
Bond Indenture.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA Bond Indenture</u>&#148; means that certain Indenture of Trust dated
as of December&nbsp;1, 1983 by the EDA and the EDA Bond Trustee with respect to
the EDA Bonds.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA Bond Trustee</u>&#148; means Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas,
as successor trustee to Bankers Trust Company under the EDA Bond Indenture.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA Borrower</u>&#148; means the Estate of Russell Berrie.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA Documents</u>&#148; means, collectively, the EDA Loan Guarantee, the
EDA Standby L/C Reimbursement Agreement and the EDA Financing Statements.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA Financing Statements</u>&#148; means (i) that certain financing
statement naming the Borrower as debtor and EDA Standby L/C Issuer as secured
party, filed on February&nbsp;17, 2000 in the UCC Section, Department of
Treasury of the State of New Jersey under file number 1957259, and (ii) that
certain financing statement naming the Borrower as debtor and EDA Bond Trustee
as secured party, filed on December&nbsp;10, 2004 in the UCC Section,
Department of Treasury of the State of New Jersey under file number 22713766.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA Loan Agreement</u>&#148; means that certain Loan Agreement dated as
of December&nbsp;1, 1983 between EDA and EDA Borrower.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA Loan Guarantee</u>&#148; means that certain Guarantee dated as of December&nbsp;1,
1983, as amended through the Effective Date (without giving effect to any
amendment or other modification thereof after the Effective Date, except to the
extent expressly consented to by the Required Lenders), by the Borrower in
favor of the EDA, the EDA Bond Trustee and EDA Bondholders, purporting to
guaranty the obligations of EDA Borrower under the EDA Loan Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA Lien</u>&#148; means the security interest granted by the Borrower
in favor of the EDA Bond Trustee and the EDA Standby L/C Issuer on accounts
receivable and inventory of the Borrower to secure its obligations under the
EDA Loan Guarantee and the EDA Standby L/C Reimbursement Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA Standby L/C Issuer</u>&#148; means The Bank of New York.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA Standby L/C</u>&#148; means that certain Letter of Credit dated March&nbsp;25,
1994, as amended as the Effective Date (without giving effect to any amendment
or other modification thereof after the Effective Date, except to the extent
expressly consented to by the Required Lenders and except for Non-Materially
Adverse Amendments), issued by the EDA Standby L/C Issuer for the account of
the Borrower in a maximum amount available to be drawn thereunder of
$7,388.356.16.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>EDA Standby L/C Reimbursement Agreement</u>&#148; means that certain
Amended and Restated Letter of Credit Reimbursement Agreement dated as of March&nbsp;25,
1994, as amended through the Effective Date (without giving effect to any
amendment or other modification thereof after the Effective Date, except to the
extent expressly consented to by the Required Lenders) between the EDA Standby
L/C Issuer and the Borrower.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Effective Date</u>&#148; means the date, which all of the conditions
precedent set forth in <u>Section&nbsp;5.01</u> are first satisfied or waived
by the Agents and the Lenders and the Term Loan is advanced to the Borrower.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>
